definition: mountain/hill/anything that resembles a mountain/CL:座[zuo4]/bundled straw in which silkworms spin cocoons/gable
high mountain/highest peak of a mountain ridge

sentences.english: A father's goodness is higher than the mountain, a mother's goodness deeper than the sea.
sentences.chinese: 父親的仁慈高於山嶽，母親的善良深於滄海。

sentences.english: I shall never forget the magnificence of the Swiss mountains and the beauty of the lakes.
sentences.chinese: 我永遠也不會忘記瑞士山嶽的壯美和湖泊的秀麗。

sentences.english: The Montagnards had no common programme generally acknowledged by all its members.
sentences.chinese: 山嶽派沒有被認可的共同綱領。

sentences.english: Mountain glaciers are found in all parts of the world where mountain ranges are high.
sentences.chinese: 世界各地凡山脈高聳的地方都有山嶽冰川。

sentences.english: Farewell to the mountains, high-cover'd with snow.
sentences.chinese: 別了啊，高聳的積雪的山嶽。

sentences.english: Mountain glaciers may vary in length and thickness .
sentences.chinese: 山嶽冰川在長度和厚度方面各不相同。

sentences.english: Mountains and all hills, fruitful trees and all cedars.
sentences.chinese: 山嶽和一切丘陵，果樹與各種柏松。

sentences.english: Switzerland is famous for its mountains.
Look for the telling details that reflect the spirit of the mountains, too.
sentences.chinese: 此外也要尋找能夠體現山嶽氣質的細節。

sentences.english: The elevation of 1,950 meters is Mt Korean Han the highest mountain.
sentences.chinese: 海拔1，950米的漢拿山是韓國的最高山嶽。

sentences.english: It is time the hunters to confront the lofty mountains, and the seamen, the vast sea.
sentences.chinese: 現在是獵人面對山嶽，以及海員，茫茫大海。

sentences.english: The mountain in the background is the active volcano Mount Erebus .
sentences.chinese: 背景的山嶽是世界最南端的活火山艾瑞貝斯峯。

sentences.english: The highest mountain in Great Britain is Ben Nevis in Scotland.
sentences.chinese: 在英國最高的山嶽是在蘇格蘭本尼維斯。

sentences.english: The paper discussed the mountainous scenic spot plan methods by an example of Baiyunshan Scenic Spot in Fuan.
sentences.chinese: 論文結合實例對山嶽型風景區規劃的方法進行探討。

definition: the sky/the firmament/the vault of heaven
(bird species of China) northern goshawk (Accipiter gentilis)
marble pillar (ornamental column in front of places, tombs)
to cross (a road, an ocean etc)/to cut across
border fort, esp. defending narrow valley
Longsha district of Qiqihar city 齊齊哈爾|齐齐哈尔[Qi2 qi2 ha1 er3], Heilongjiang
lit. ten thousand stampeding horses (idiom)/fig. with great momentum/going full speed ahead
